Our Portfolio

Experience the quality of product you could get, tailored to your business needs. Developed specifically for you and your team.

Tic Tac Toe

I coded a game of computer vs player Tic Tac Toe. It's only got 1 difficulty...HARD!! Try and win. Leave us some feedback after you play a few rounds against me and let me know if you were engaged.

Checkers

Have you ever wanted to vs a real opponent with real skill and tactics when playing Checkers? Look no further. I am here and have coded logic that makes the game engaging and keeps you on your toes.

Online Store

I coded an Online Store in PHP for my site. It uses a MariaDB database and has a table with all the product information. I then use SQL and commands to transform the data into a storefront.

AI Chat Bot

I coded a PHP OpenAI Chatbot that is fully functional and can mantain a persistent conversation, give you product information hidden on the site and much more. Send tweets, Google Search, Voice-to-Text and the list goes on.

Premium support

Experience the intergrated support systems in an integrated ticketing system with chatbot functionality. Let AI handle the hard conversations and let customers escalate to a SysAdmin via a ticket.

Bootstrap

This website was coded used Bootstrap 5 for CSS Styling. The responsive grid layout and mobile-first design heavily influences the aesthentics of this site. Not to say the desktop version doesn't have more features.

What's our Stacks

We are a small development team and make up for it in optimal choice in frameworks and libraries for streamlined development. Web Design as a Service is definitely a possibility.

What is a Stack?

It is a stack of applications that you use together to build a website or application

LEMP Stack

Linux, Nginx, MariaDB & PHP. My personal favourite stack. It's simple yet effective in server side rendering. Easy to setup and update at a moments notice with very little configuration.

Laravel LEMP Stack

Similar to a LEMP Stack but uses Laravel as the backend PHP framework. Laravel provides support for a range of popular PHP libraries and can help simplify the routing and authentication.

VILB Stack

VueJS, IntertiaJS, Laravel & Bootstrap. This stack uses VueJS as the frontend framework, Laravel as the backend framework, InteriaJS for building the SPA and Bootstrap for CSS Styling.

NLTB Stack

NuxtJS, Laravel, Tailwind CSS & Bootstrap. This is a more streamlined VILB Stack. NuxtJS helps create SPA's out of the box and supports dynamic and static rendering per component. Laravel is uses as a backend API and Bootstrap and Tailwind CSS are used for styling different components.
